conclusion: Determine which container liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.
Arrows indicate the direction in which the liquid will flow.
Liquid will flow from A towards D.
Liquid will flow from B towards E.
Liquid will flow from C towards E.
Baffle A is positioned to direct liquid towards container D.
Baffle B is positioned to direct liquid towards container E.
Baffle C is positioned to direct liquid towards container E.
Liquid from A will flow into container D.
Liquid from B will flow into container E.
Liquid from C will flow into container E.
Liquid from A will flow into container D; liquid from B and C will flow into container E.
